price: What remains from the provision of Allah is far better[50], if you are [true] believers; I am not a keeper over you.”
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ
footnotes: [50] Whatever is left after giving full measure is better and purer than what is fraudulently gained.
